properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:26AM EST until February 6 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Toccoa/Ocoee River Above Copperhill TN affecting Fannin and Polk
Counties

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Toccoa/Ocoee River Above Copperhill TN.
* From this morning until this evening.
* At 09:30 AM Thursday the stage was 7.0 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this morning and continue
to rise to near 9.5 feet by this afternoon. The river will fall
below flood stage by this evening.
* At 10.0 feet...Minor flooding expands into woodlands, fields, and
backyards of homes near the river. The rock access road to the gage
will be under two feet of water. Portions of parking lots near the
river will begin to flood behind the Copperhill Tennessee Post
Office and other businesses along Ocoee Street. Also flooding
expands into the backyards of homes and the Horsebend Park in
McCaysville Georgia.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
